snippet: Natalia Zabolotna, general director of the largest art institution in Ukraine, said the work by Volodymyr Kuznetsov was “a provocation.”
abstract: Natalia Zabolotna, general director of the largest art institution in Ukraine, said the work by Volodymyr Kuznetsov was “a provocation.”

headline.main: Museum Director in Ukraine Paints Over a Mural She Doesn't Like
headline.print_headline: Ukraine Museum Director Paints Over a Mural
